storyInfo: Blue Poison will soon be deployed on a mission to build a safe house in a place that just happens to be her ancestral homeland that she's never visited. And perhaps the only place in the world where she won't be branded as toxic.

attributes.content: How much longer?
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: Be patient.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: It smells really good, though.
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: This is the most enjoyable moment in baking. Watching the batter slowly turn golden and puff up in the oven, until it turns into a soft, fluffy cake...
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: Desserts taste best when you let your imagination run wild, Glau.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: I'd rather have one I can put in my mouth. So what's our flavor of the day?
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: Hm... It's a new formula. Fresh cream mixed with a jam made from various kinds of berries. That gives it a sort of tropical flavor.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: Sure, but its color is as terrifying as ever. Your fashion sense is pretty decent, so how the heck did your sense for food aesthetics end up downright rotten?
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: Hm? But I heard brighter colors can help increase appetites.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: I think most people would disagree with your definition of bright colors.
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: You say that, but you'll still eat it in the end.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: That's 'cause it tastes good.
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: Too bad all those self-proclaimed dessert lovers will never know the kind of lusciousness they're missing out on.
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: Not everyone's special like you.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: It's not like you poison your cakes.
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: *Sigh*... Normally, this break room would be pretty packed around now, but it feels like there have been way less people ever since we arrived.
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: Don't say that. I'm not being ostracized or anything. I'm actually very happy with my life here.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: But the best way to get along with something 'toxic' is to stay away from it. I know that, you know that, everyone knows that.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: On the bright side, how often do you get the whole break room to yourself? Let's try to enjoy this before we head out for our field mission.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: I suppose we won't get much of a chance to enjoy a cake in the Sargon Barrenlands anyway.
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: I hope the mission goes well.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: You say that like you have nothing to do with it. Aren't you the leader of the guerrilla team? True, all we're doing is building a safe house, but we can't let our guard down.
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: I heard it's way off the beaten track. Who knows what we'll run into out there. What was it called again...?
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: Kerthun.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: Right, Kerthun Valley. Have you ever been there?
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: No, never.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: Hm, then I guess I'll read over the mission briefing while we eat. First I need to confirm the supply point...
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: Oh, sounds like it's done.
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: Alright, now to put the cream on it...
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: Adnachiel, are you baking another cake behind my back again?!
Oh.
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: Ambriel?
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: Sorry, I smelled cake, so I just...
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: You want some too? It's straight out of the oven.
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: No, I think I'll...
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: (Gulps)
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Did Blue Poison make this...? Why can't it ever be easy?
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Please, go ahead and try some if you don't mind. We have tea, too.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: Hmm, well, not like I have anything better to do... Guess I can kill some time here.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: As for the cake, let me prepare myself mentally first.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Um, if you're worried about poison, you don't need to force yourself...
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: Nah, that's not it.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Isn't, like, the color of that jam kinda creepy?
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Phew—
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Tasty, right?
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: I've heard about your baking from Gummy, but this is something else. You could drive half of Laterano's dessert shops out of business.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: The two-bit ones always just load up on sugar, with no idea how to balance flavors. Sweet doesn't have to mean unbearably sweet!
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: ...Wow. It's an honor to hear that from a bona fide Lateran.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: You should feel even prouder then, 'cause praise from an expert like me is worth its weight in gold.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: If only more people were willing to give them a shot. I always feel guilty getting the whole cake to myself.
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: Well, I, for one, am willing to put my life on the line for an exquisite dessert.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: ...So you were worried, after all?
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: If so, Medical has an antidote specifically for my toxins. It's kind of embarrassing to say this myself, but if you need it—
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: Shoot, sorry, I didn't mean it like that!
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Watch out, your bag!
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: These are...
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: Ahaha, I had the antidote prepared in advance. I mean, we *are* going on a field op together in a couple days.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Oh, right, you're part of our team this mission.
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: Yeah, so we're gonna be fighting side by side, right? It's just a precaution, a precaution. Y'know what they say, better safe than...
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: I'm sorry, I'm sorry, I'm so sorry!
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: No, please don't apologize. I actually prepared enough antidote for everyone too. It's my responsibility for being toxic.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: If everyone else is uncomfortable with me being there, then I should be the one apologizing.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: Blue Poison...
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Then, like, can I have another slice?
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Ambriel?
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: Please, I know you're trying to be kind, but you don't have to—
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: C'mon, what of self-respecting Lateran would force themselves to eat cake? Just gimme another slice.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Huh. I think I'm starting to see you in a new light. Here you go.
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: Thanks.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: But man, I wish I could just have complete trust in my friends like you, Glaucus.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Oh, that's because her toxins don't work on me.
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: *Cough* *cough*!
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Slow down! Here, have some antidote.
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: *Cough*! No, no that, tea, tea—
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: You sure? This is fruit juice-flavored. I had Dr. Warfarin come up with the formula.
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: Who cares, just give it!
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Pfff... Hahahaha!
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: Thanks, Ambriel.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: If only... all my days here at Rhodes Island could be like this.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: Pwah—That hits the spot! Sorry, what was that?
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Oh, nothing.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: Anyway, since you're here, let's read over the mission briefing while we're eating.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: Huh? We're really gonna start working, just like that? This is the break room! I came here to slack off!
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: But fine, fine, I'll work overtime, just for you, Bloop. Like, I have to thank you for the cake.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: The Kerthun Valley is situated in a vast rainforest within Sargon's borders. Since time immemorial, it has never been under the direct control of the Sargonian lords ameer.
This was the most important factor in Rhodes Island's decision to build a safe house there.
There are many reasons for its unique geopolitical position. Data show that the area is abundant with natural resources, and many lords ameer have tried to expand their influence into the region.
Yet their efforts were all in vain.
The specific reasons require further investigation, but according to a local guide, it very likely has to do with the indigenous people.
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: Those natives are also the biggest variable in our mission. The guide said they aren't too hard to get along with, but also warned that they possess a terrifying ability.
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: We only have vague descriptions of the phenomenon in question, but based on our analysis, their ability might be an application of some kind of toxic chemical compound...
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: Whoa, sounds like a huge pain.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Relax. The mission's difficulty rating isn't all that high. We aren't there to pick a fight.
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: Blue Poison?
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: Oh, don't mind me. Go on.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: Okay, where was I...
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: We're going to build a safe house there. It will also be used as both a Catastrophe monitoring station and a temporary medical post. Our job will be over once the local employees have moved in.
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: Yep, about as standard as it gets.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: In other words, if all goes well, we'll be back on the landship baking cakes in a couple of months.
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: What do you mean, 'if all goes well'? You trying to jinx us?!
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: ...Have you considered that you're a little oversensitive?
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: Still, there's one thing that's kinda bothering me. Those natives... Like, what race are they?
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: We have no data on it. Supposedly, they don't have any particular distinctive features, but...
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: They're Anura.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: Just like me.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: ...How do you know?
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: Because they're from my tribe.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: Kerthun is my homeland.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: What? Why are you only telling us this now? This is news to me!
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: I had no reason to bring it up, Glau. I wasn't lying when I said I'd never been there. I grew up in Iberia.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: Everything I know about the place, I learned from my grandmother.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.text: Kerthun. That the name of our homeland.
Only there are we not treated as outsiders.
Only there can we truly live a peaceful life.
Only there are we not burdened with being a

attributes.content: So what's it like?
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Hm, I'm not too sure myself. My grandma told me a lot of stories, but honestly she made it all sound a bit too wonderful, like a fairy tale.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: My people moved from Sargon to Iberia over a hundred years ago. 'Moved,' she told me. Even that is something of a euphemism for the bitter truth.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: We were sold to Iberia as test subjects. Our lives are inseparable from poison from the moment we're born. It's an unfortunate talent, but some people always see things differently.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: Conspiracies and poison. Two sides of the same coin, don't you think?
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: Listen, we don't have to talk about this if you don't want to.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: I'm fine. But thanks for worrying about me.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: Truth is, I've only heard about these experiments secondhand. Ever since the disaster, Iberia's been too busy sorting out its own mess to deal with outcasts like us.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: That cruel past is now nothing more than stories passed down by the older generation, and Kerthun itself is even more of a legend to us.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: My grandma always started off like, 'A long time ago, when we were still in faraway Kerthun...' You've all heard stories like that too, right?
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: 'A long time ago, when the Ægir still lived under the sea...'
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: 'A long time ago, before Laterano was completed...'
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Hehe, see? All legends start the same.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: Yeah... I don't think I could laugh that off.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: It was those legends of beautiful Kerthun that kept my family going, from one generation to the next.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: It was a paradise. A place where no one would fear or scorn us as 'toxic.'
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: My grandma always said our life of ostracization and fear was just a trial for us to endure. Once we were back in Kerthun, everything would be better.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: This might sound funny, but it was only on her deathbed that she finally told me that she'd never even been there either. And she was the oldest in our family.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: All those stories she'd loved telling us were made up, based on the stories *she'd* heard growing up, and her own imagination.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: She didn't even know where it was.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: But now we do.
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: Yeah. And I never imagined I'd find out like this.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: Great! Like, now you get a chance to go back home! Does it really count as home, though...?
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Speaking from experience, you should keep your expectations in check. The actual Kerthun might be nothing like the legends.
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: (Uneasy) And you'd still rather stay at Rhodes Island, right?
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.text: Only there are we not burdened with being a

attributes.content: Blue Poison?
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: Yeah, perhaps.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: But if that's the only place where I can be myself...
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: Doctor?
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: Phew, don't scare me like that. I'm not slacking off, okay?!
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Doctor, want to try some cake that Blue Poison baked? It's fresh out of the oven.
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: B-But...
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: U-Um, if you don't mind, I have some antidotes prepared...
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: No, wait, your situation is a little unique. Let me get Dr. Kal'tsit first—
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.options: Delish.;(Continues munching);The berries, plantains, and nuts make it so good.

attributes.content: Um... Are you really okay?
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: You've had two people trying out your cake today. That's a new record.
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: Yep, a new record.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: Don't overthink it, Blue. You've always belonged here.
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: Thanks, Ambriel, Glaucus.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: And thank you, Doctor.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: If... If I can really...
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: No, never mind. Please forget I said anything.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: See you at the meeting, Doctor.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.options: Have you all read up on the mission?

attributes.content: Yes, we're quite familiar with the details.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: But I would like to repeat my request to be removed as team captain. I'm not the right person to lead a team in an operation.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: Everybody knows that my toxins could harm others...
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: Really...?
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: That's right. We're counting on you, Captain.
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: 'Sides, we've got, like, tons of antidotes.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Apple-flavored, too.
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: Haha... I guess.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.options: Can I leave this to you, Captain Blue Poison?

attributes.content: I will give it my all.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: Okay, off we go now.
attributes.name: Glaucus

attributes.content: Yep, see you in a little.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: Let me help you clean up your files, Doctor.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: (Did our hands... just touch?!)
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: I'm so sorry I touched you!
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: Please come with me. We need to head to Medical to get it cleaned up! If not... If not...
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: But...!
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: But I... I'm 'toxic.' Anything that touches me is in danger.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: Am I really allowed to be?
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: —Phew.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: In that case, I'd like to remove an application from that stack of documents.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: I actually submitted a transfer request not too long ago. I was hoping to be stationed at the Kerthun safe house after the mission.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: When I was a kid, my grandmother told me that Kerthun was the only place where we could ever live without being branded 'toxic.' And I believed her.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: But I'm the only one who can decide who I am, aren't I?
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: I'm a member of Rhodes Island, and I like my life here.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: So please, let me withdraw that application before anyone reads it.
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: Oh, and one other thing, Doctor...
attributes.name: Blue Poison

attributes.content: I have an idea for a new dessert. Would you like to try it later, if you have time?
attributes.name: Blue Poison
